cs155.jray

Class Light3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs155.jray.Light3D

  • public class Light3D
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents 3D lights with the full OpenGL color model. So there are several parameters including Color3D values for the ambient, diffuse, and specular illumination as well as the attenuation coefficients: attC, attL, attQ - representing the Constant, Linear, and Quadratic components Finally we include an intensity to make it easy to increase the brightness of a all components of a light.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Light3D()
      create a default white light at the origin

      create a default white light at a specified location

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double attenuation(double length)
      calculate the attentuation of the light based on its distance from the illuminated point
      static double diffuse(Point3D lightVec, Point3D normal)
      calculate the diffuse intensity
      static double specular(Point3D lightVec, Point3D normal, Point3D eyeVec, int hardness)
      calculate the specular intensity of the light
      double spot(Point3D lookAt)
      this returns the spotlight intensity which is 1.0 for all non-spotlights
